resources.name: Add Plan
resources.description:
### Allow Admin user to add plan for users

### Categories of plan
1. Beginner (default)
2. Personal
3. Entrepreneur
4. Professional

**Authentication required**

<!-- RESPONSE -->
 {
	"success": true,
	"msg": "Plan created successfully"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Update Plan
resources.description:
### Allow Admin to update the various plans available

**Athenticiation required**

<!-- RESPONSE -->
 {
	"success": true,
	"msg": "plan updated successfully"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Add Appearance
resources.description:
### Allow user to add appearance to page

#### Description
This is used for creating and updating of appearance

The **type** field has the following values:
- font
- theme
- link
- icon
- colour

The `icon` **type** requires `iconImage` **field**

**Authentication required**

<!-- RESPONSE -->
 {
	"success": true,
	"msg": "Operation Successful"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Add Link
resources.description:
### Allow user to add link and upload vidoes 

#### Description
The **type** field has the following values:
- link
- section
- embed

and is required

### `Complete Request body`
{
			"url": "wit.com",
			"title": "twitter handle",
			"theme": " ",
			"subtitle": "dummytext",
			"type": "link",
			"dataFile":""
}

### Access 
Only users with **Personal** Plan can send `title` filed.
Only users **Enterpreneur** Plan can add `theme` or the `dataFile` field using the `embed` **type**.

**Authentication required**

<!-- RESPONSE -->
 {
	"success": true,
	"msg": "Operation Successful"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Create   Profile
resources.description:
### Allow user to create profle infor

**Authentication is required**

### Description
**Field**
- `displayName`
- `description`
- `location` 
- `colour`

`displayName`, 
`description` and
`location` are required.

`profileImage` field is used to send profile image data
`bgImage` field is used to send profile background image data
**they are optional** also the `colour` field
<!-- RESPONSE -->
 {
	"success": true,
	"msg": "Profile created sucessfully"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Update Profile
resources.description:
### Allow user to update profle infor

**Authentication is required**

### Description
 
All the fields can be send individually.
<!-- RESPONSE -->
 {
	"success": true,
	"msg": "Profile updated sucessfully"
}
<!-- ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Recovery Mail
resources.description:
### Allow user send password recovery link

### Description
Password reset link expires after 30 minutes.

**Note:** users should only be able to access this route only when the accound has been searched and found, by providing the `id`from the search result.
<!--RESPONSE -->
{
	"success": true,
	"id": "04183364-82c5-419e-9d07-8449b4c7cf3e4",
	"msg": "Recovery mail sent successfully"
}
<!--ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Verify Reset
resources.description:
### Used to verify recovering link

**Description**
Reovery link must be verify before user is redirected to the `Reset password` route.

The `id` field is the id from the `Recover mail` endpoint
<!--RESPONSE -->
{
	"success": true,
	"id": "1289fd07-bf47-45d4-87bd-8887fd256b594",
	"msg": "Link is valid"
}
<!--ENDRESPONSE-->

resources.name: Reset Password
resources.description:
### Allow user reset password

 **Note**
 `id` field from the `verify Result` endpoint is required and the `newPassword`
 
<!--RESPONSE -->
{
	"success": true,
	"msg": "Password reset successful"
}
<!--ENDRESPONSE-->
